title: I have the cure to cancer but I won't give it until Riot changes Fiora back to the old Fiora!
body:
Almost half of us will have cancer one day.

I have the cure to cancer but I won't tell you what it is unless you give Fiora her Blade Waltz and her lunge back Riot!

Think of all the lives that could be saved here!

All you have to do is do the right thing and fix Fiora the way she used to be!

Millions of lives depend on you Riot!

replies.body: I like her rework, but hate the new model, what the fuck is that run? It looks like shes trying to stop a turd from coming out.
I see having Fiora is ruined is so much more important than the cure for cancer...

Yeah I think there's a tumor on my balls.

Also I love memes haha! 

Anyone else here love memes?
I really do have the cure if anybody has some family or something they would like to cure.
